item.title: I need some help with my objects (i figured it out no thanks to you people)
item.dc:creator: @Jonathan_M Jonathan M
item.description:
@Jonathan_M wrote:

here is my code i have, i put it in client.java in the rifts place (air rift, mind rift ect ect) made sure it wasn’t in the middle of coding (like in the middle of a rift coding) and now i cant get on to the server, the screen goes black…and sometimes i can get in, but it freezes when it loads…heres my code

if (objectID == 2466 && objectX == 3217 && objectY == 3426) {
				if (HasItemAmount(3706,1)) {
				sendMessage("Welcome to the secret club!");
				teleportToX = 2898;
				teleportToY = 3508;
				}
				else {
				sendMessage("Nothing intresting happens");
				}
				}
				if (objectID == 2468 && objectX == 2899 && objectY == 3509) {
				if (HasItemAmount(3706,1)) {
				sendMessage("Come back now, ya hear?");
				teleportToX = 3218;
				teleportToY = 3426;
				}
				else {
				sendMessage("Nothing intresting happens");
				}
				}

See anything wrong with it?

“So you wanna spawn objects??” WOW!!! Stupid spammer!

Read full topic
item.source: I need some help with my objects (i figured it out no thanks to you people)
